verses.content: “Miin bâwngchal amanih, berâm inru sienla, lo zawrin amanih lo that sienla; bâwngchal pakhat aia chun bâwngchal panga pêng a ta, berâm pakhat aia chun berâm pali a pêk ding a nih.
Inru chu ina a lût lai hmuin, vuokin lo thi ta sienla, ama chunga chun thisen phuba um naw nih.
Ama chunga chun nisa a suok ta chun, ama ta dingin thisen phuba chu um a tih. Inru chun a thung ngei ding a nih. Iengkhawm a nei naw chun ama chu iengkhat inrûk mana zawr ding a nih.
A thil inrûk chu, bâwngchal amanih, sabengtung amanih, berâm amanih a hringa a kuta hmu a ni chun, a lêthni peiin thung a tih.
“Miin lo amanih, grêp huon infâktirin, annawleh, a ran chu insuoin mi dang loah intlattir sienla; a lo laia a ṭha tak le, a grêp huon laia a ṭha takin thung a tih.
“Mei a suok a, ṭhûlah a kâng mat pei a, bu hlum amanih, buvui ngîr lai amanih, lo amanih a kâng hmang chun, mei insuotu chun a thung ngei ding a nih.
“Miin a vênghai kuomah tangka amanih, bûrlebêl kawl dinga a pêk a, chu mipa ina inthawka inrûk a nih a, ân rutu chu man a ni chun, a lêt hniin a thung ngei ding a nih.
Inru chu man a ni naw chun, a in neitu chun a vênghai thuomhnaw chunga chun kutkem a lo hmang le hmang naw fie dingin Pathien kuomah a hung ding a nih.

Thil inhmang thubuoi tinah, bâwngchal khawm, sabengtung khawm, berâm khawm, silfên khawm, thil inhmang ieng ienga khawm, mi pakhatin, ‘Hi hi a nih,’ a ti phawt chun, a khingtuokhai ve ve chu Pathien hmaah hung an ta, Pathienin ân thiemnaw chun a vêngpa kuoma chun a lêt hniin thung a tih.

“Miin a vênghai kuomah sa- bengtung amanih, bâwngchal am- anih, berâm amanih ran hrim hrim enkawl dingin sie sienla, lo thiin amanih, suknatin amanih, khal hmangin lo umin, mi tukhawmin hmu naw hai sien,
a vênghai thuomhnawhai chungah kutkem a hmang le hmang naw, LALPA hmaa inkhâmna chu an inkârah um ve vêng a ta, chu chu a ran neitu khawm chun pawm a ta; a thung ṭûl naw nih.
Nisienlakhawm, amaa inthawk- a inrûk hmang a ni chun, a ran neitu chu a thung ding a nih.
Ramsa ikeinâwi vawng amanih a lo ni chun, hrietfiena dingin hung lâng a ta, keinâwia um ta hnung chu thung ta naw nih.
“Miin a vênghai ran iengkhawm haw sienla, lo thi amanih, inhliem lo ni sienla, a neitu ṭhanglo a ni chun, a thung ngei ding a nih.
A neitu a ṭhang ruok chun, thung chuong naw nih a; man neia haw a ni chun haw a ni dân dân chun fêng a tih.
“Miin nunghâk inthieng huol la ni lo, thlemin lo zâlpui sienla, a man pêng a ta, a nei ngei ding a nih.
“A pa chun ama chu a pêk nuom dêr naw chun, nunghâk man ang hu tangka a pek tho ding a nih.
“Dawithiemnu chu a hring i phal ding a ni nawh.
“Tukhawm ran rîm taphawt chu sukhlum a ni ngei ding a nih.
“LALPA ti chau lo pathien dang hrim hrim kuoma inthâwi chu sukbohmang dêr nîng a tih.
Mikhuol chu indiknawtakin i thaw ding a ni nawh a, i suknawmna ding khawm a ni nawh; nang khawm Aiguptaah mikhuol i ni ta kha.
Hmeithai amanih, fahra chu i sukrimsi ding a ni nawh.
Ieng kawnga khawm i suk- rimsih a, kei an mi hung ko phawt chun, an mi kona lo hre ngei ngei ka ta;
ka lunginsenna chu hung lum a ta, kâwlhnâmin that ka ti cheh a; i nuhmei chu hmeithai nîng a ta; i nauhai chu fahra nîng an tih.
“I kuoma ka mihai pasie tukhawm kuomah tangka în pûktir chun, a chunga chun lei inbattirtu ang i ni ding a ni nawh a; ama chunga chun a pung i hnawt kher ding a ni nawh.
“I vênghai silfên tiemkama i lâk chun nisa tlâk hmain i pêk nâwk ngei ding a nih;
chu chu a puonsil neisun a nih a, a taksa inkhumna dinga a puon chu a nih; khâwlai am zâl tâng a ta? Chun, kei a mi hung ko pha lo hrieng ka tih, mi lunginsiettheitak ka ni sih a.
“Pathien i hrilsiet ding a ni nawh a, i mihai rorêltu khawm chu ṭawngsie în phur ding a ni bawk nawh.
“I sinthaw ra po poa dâwnmihai le fâkmihaia ra hmasa tak chu în hlân inhnu ding a ni nawh. I naupasalhaia nau lutîr chu i mi pêk ding a nih.
Chuong ang bawk chun i bâwngchalhai, i berâmhai i thaw ding a nih; ni sari chu a pui leh um an ta, ni riet ni chun ka kuomah i pêk ding a nih.
“Ka kuoma chun mi inthieng nîng in ta, chuongchun, ramsahai fâk hnung sa hrim hrim chu fa naw ti niu a, uihai kuomah pe lem in tih.
